thread.title: MoneyTV with Donald Baillargeon, 10/23

author: stockhouse.com
title: MoneyTV with Donald Baillargeon, 10/23
text:
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Sanctuary cities, event management, cannabis, non-GMO, torrents, credit repair, fantasy sports, app development, solar; this week on MoneyTV with Donald Baillargeon . MoneyTV is the internationally syndicated television program all about money and what makes it happen, ( http://www.moneytv.net ), featuring informative interviews with company CEOs, providing insights into their operations and outlooks for their futures.
Free information packages from the featured companies can be requested by sending an email to [email protected] .
The television program can also be viewed online immediately at www.moneytv.net .
Featured companies on this week's program include:
Sack Lunch Productions, Inc. (OTCPINK: SAKL) CEO Richard Surber detailed the company's various events they produce. MoneyTV has initiated coverage of SAKL.
Monster Arts, Inc. (OTCPINK: APPZ) CEO Wayne Irving announced the completion of company audits.
The Green Polka Dot Box, Inc. (OTCPINK: GPDB) CEO Rod Smith announced the signing of new Health Merchants.
PeerLogix, Inc. (OTCQB: LOGX) CEO William Gorfein spoke of the value of torrent users to advertisers.
CLS Holdings USA , Inc. (OTCQB: CLSH) Chairman & CEO Jeffrey Binder discussed the company's plans to "white label" cannabis products for other companies.
XsunX, Inc. (OTCPINK: XSNX) CEO Tom Djokovich told a story of how their solar installation saved a client more than 90% of their electric bill.
Trycera Financial, Inc. (OTCQB: TRYF) CEO Ray Smith announced that payment for Trycera services are now reportable to credit bureaus.
Singlepoint, Inc. (OTCPINK: SING) CEO Greg Lambrecht announced the company was entering the fantasy sports space.
A complete menu of TV listings is available at the MoneyTV web site, http://www.moneytv.net .
MoneyTV Executive Producer and Anchor Donald Baillargeon is also the host of MoneyRap Radio, http://www.moneyrap.com and the daily television program Global Financial News Minute with Donald Baillargeon .
MoneyTV with Donald Baillargeon television program, Copyright MMXV, all rights reserved. MoneyTV does not provide an analysis of companies' financial positions and is not soliciting to purchase or sell securities of the companies, nor are we offering a recommendation of featured companies or their stocks. Information discussed herein has been provided by the companies and should be verified independently with the companies and a securities analyst. MoneyTV provides companies a 3 to 4 month corporate profile with multiple appearances for a cash fee of $11,995.00 to $17,250.00, does not accept company stock as payment for services, does not hold any positions, options or warrants in featured companies. The information herein is not an endorsement by Donald Baillargeon, the producer, publisher or parent company of MoneyTV.

 5:00 AM EDT Tags: CONGLOMERATES CONSUMER CYCLICAL CREDIT SERVICES ELECTRONIC GAMING & MULTIMEDIA
